title.rendered: MLK affirmed BOTH Israel and Palestine.  Israel must return land it stole.

content.rendered:
Martin Luther King, Jr., strongly supported peace, nonviolence, and social justice in many ways.

He affirmed BOTH Israel and Palestine.

He said Israel’s government must return the land it stole from Palestinian people.

See this recent item reporting on what he had said in 1967:

We Don’t Have to Guess What MLK Thought About the Israel-Palestine Conflict – Mother Jones
